long_description: Visiting Australia in the heat of the summer? Bring the women's Columbia Global Adventure Shirt to wear over your tee or on its own. You'll love its special wicking and sun protection properties. Polyester/elastane fabric offers 2-way stretch for freedom of movement. Omni-Wick EVAP(TM) advanced wicking technology disperses sweat quickly across a broad surface for faster evaporation; thus, you stay drier and more comfortable. Omni-Shade(TM) technology gives you excellent UPF 40 sun protection. Columbia women's Global Adventure Shirt hides a zippered security pocket in the right side seam.
short_description: Visiting Australia in the heat of the summer? Bring the women's Columbia Global Adventure Shirt to wear over your tee or on its own. You'll love its special wicking and sun protection properties.
